content.rendered:
Directed by Sankalp Reddy.

Written by Sankalp Reddy. Niranjan Ramireddy. Gunnam Gangaraju. Azad Alam.

Cast Rana Daggubati(Lt.Commander Arjun Varma). Kay Kay Menon(Captain Rann Vijay Singh). Atul Kulkarni(XO Devaraj). Om Puri(Admiral India Navy). Nassar(Vice Admiral Indian Navy). Rahul Singh(Commander Razak Mohd Khan). Milind Gunaji(RAW Agent). Taapsee Pannu(Ananya). Amitabh Bachchan(Narrator). Chiranjeevi(Narrator). Ramanuj Dubey(Indian Cook Iqbal). Rajiv Kachroo(Pakistani Naval Commander). Satyadev Kancharana(Rajeev Thakur). Bikramjeet Kanwarpal(Navy Staff). Kunal Kaushik(Kapil Singh). Malyaban Lahiri(Ranjan Sengupta). Akshay Mittal(INS S 21 Navigation Officer). Priyadarshi Pulikonda(INS S 21 Radio Operator (as Priyadarshi)). Bharath Reddy(B Sanjay). Suriya(Narrator). Thiruveer(V Murthy). Ravi Varma(INS S 21 Battery Operator)

Languages Hindi. Telugu.

Producers Kavin Anne. Ashi Dua. Sahil Mehra. Naren. N.M. Pasha. Param V. Potluri. Pearl V. Potluri. Anvesh Reddy. Venkatramana Reddy. S.P. Shankar. Jagan Mohan Vancha.

Production Matinee Entertainments. PVP Cinema.
